episode: I was singled out in a team meeting which seemed completely unnecessary.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was singled out in a team meeting which seemed completely unnecessary.  Others agreed but could never complain about it as they were always correct.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. It must be frustrating to feel singled out. It sounds like a tough situation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was an online meeting where we just had to listen.  We were very busy so I was working whilst listening - something others always do, including management.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really unfair. Multitasking is common, especially when everyone's busy.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Fortunately I don't work there anymore but this was just one instance which makes me not miss the role.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like leaving was the right move. Good riddance!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Exactly.  They forced people out and this was one instance where they were making it difficult to continue working there.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. That sounds like a very tough environment.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was.  A difficult year before I left.  I still talk to many there and it hasn't improved.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm glad you moved on. Sounds like a wise choice.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: People skills were not great by the management there.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's unfortunate. Strong leadership is key.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Looking down on others and not willing to discuss cases in a sensible, adult fashion.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really disheartening. Everyone deserves respect and open communication.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I 100% agree.  I work much more on my own in my new job and don't have the same corporate nonsense.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a refreshing change. Glad itâ€™s better now!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Others do say I look happier now so there must be something in it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's wonderful! New job suits you well.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Pay is not as good unfortunately.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Finding happiness is priceless!
